name: Pear-wise Comparison

screenshots.caption: Window in which users can create a new comparison and add factors
Window in which users can create a new entry and add it to the current comparison
Window from which users can navigate through the application and view all of the current information
Window in which users can modify the current comparison
Window in which users can add an entry through an excel sheet
What the word document presentation looks like

short_description:
****Download zip file and run setup.exe****

This application facilitates the compilation of pairwise comparisons (To learn more visit http://deseng.ryerson.ca/~fil/t/pwisecomp.html). Traditionally done in an Excel document, pairwise comparisons can be painstaking and time consuming to put together. This application aims the make this process easier through a user friendly interface and special tools. In addition to being able to manually add entries to a given comparison, users can directly add them be selecting an appropriate excel sheet that has been filled out. The application can also create a word document containing pie charts representing the average and entry weights for each factor.
summary: Facilitates the compilation of pairwise comparisons
